effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 539,980 damage to your primary target and 92,684 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 783,573 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 75 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 695 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,602 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Saber of the Ebon Blade

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
